sections.intro: Planning your next Great Barrier Reef holiday?  We've got some of the best ways for you to experience the reef below.

deals.heading: Heron Island Resort
deals.description: A natural coral cay 89km off the coast of Queensland, Heron Island is a place for divers, swimmers and snorkellers. From $1,019 per person share twin, enjoy the peace and quiet at Heron Island Resort.

deals.heading: Daydream Island Resort
deals.description: Newly re-opened Daydream Island Resort provides modern rooms and suites. Enjoy this from $909 per person share twin, including 5 nights accommodation, free guest activities and more.

deals.heading: Mantra Aqueous on Port
deals.description: Laze by the pool or wander to the beach, Mantra Aqueous on Port is the perfect spot for your next getaway. Deal includes 7 nights accommodation and an Outer Barrier Reef Cruise.

deals.heading: Mantra Amphora
deals.description:
From $709 per person share twin, enjoy 7 nights accommodation
 at Mantra Amphora and a Quicksilver
 Outer Barrier Reef Cruise.

deals.heading: Breakfree Royal Harbour
deals.description: 7 nights accommodation plus a Quicksilver Outer Barrier Reef Cruise at the Breakfree Royal Harbour, overlooking Trinity Bay and the Cairns Lagoon from $799 per person share twin.

deals.heading: Peppers Beach Club
deals.description: Enjoy the Mediterranean villa feel of Peppers Beach Club, Port Douglas - includes 7 nights accommodation, breakfast daily, Quicksilver Outer Barrier Reef Cruise and more.
